snippet: The Ohio State senior linebacker Storm Klein has pleaded not guilty to charges of domestic violence and assault after being arrested by the Columbus police Friday.
lead_paragraph: The Ohio State senior linebacker Storm Klein has pleaded not guilty to charges of domestic violence and assault after being arrested by the Columbus police Friday.

headline.seo: Ohio State Linebacker Storm Klein Arrested for Domestic Violence
headline.main: Buckeyes Senior Is Arrested for Domestic Violence
